credit_line: Gift of Mrs. G. Macculloch Miller
title: Costume Design:  Two Pirates, for Daphnis et Chloe
provenance: Gift of Mrs. G. Macculloch Miller
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on illustration board
description: Two figures standing, facing frontally, side by side.  Each is dressed in elaborately patterned garb and has his right hand resting on his hip while the left hand holds a tall bow.
name: Drawing
